source_objects.description: Learn human resources with courses ranging from oracle human capital management to attracting, hiring and retaining the best people.
source_objects.title: Human Resources

items.title: Personality: Understanding DISC Behavioural Styles at Work
items.headline: Influencing Skills using DISC Behavioural Styles
objectives_summary: Identify the four behavioural styles of DISC - Dominance, Influence, Steadiness and Compliance.
Recognise ways of distinguishing between the behavioural styles and choose the best communication method for each.
Explore behavioural styles with a focus on your style and how to work with others with different styles.

items.title: Diploma Course in Human Resource Management (HRM)

visible_instructors.name: Akaaro Consulting
visible_instructors.title: Akaaro Consulting and Training
visible_instructors.job_title: HR, Legal & Financial Management Consulting firm

items.headline: Become top-notch HRM Practitioner - Get Live Projects, Ready-to-use Templates, Demos,  Quizzes, Articles, Case studies
objectives_summary: Get Diploma in Human Resource Management

Get ready-to-use Templates for Employee Manual, Leave Policy, Job Application Form, Offer Letter, Appointment Letter, Joining Report, Master Data, Experience Certificate, Performance Management policy, Goal setting, Appraisal Form, Disciplinary Enquiry, Employee Pulse survey, Exit Form and many more
Demos: Job portal, Onboarding, Payroll Processing, HRIS and many more

items.title: HR Course - Agile PeopleOps Framework (APF) : Foundation

visible_instructors.name: Culturelligence
visible_instructors.title: Culturelligence LLC
visible_instructors.job_title: Redefining values and culture, the agile way

items.headline: Agile for HR (Human Resources) | Introduction to Agile People Ops Framework | HR Course | Recruitment
objectives_summary: Learn what Agile is and why it is so important in today's dynamic business world
Understand Agile Manifesto - Values and Principles
Understand the paradigm shift in Human Resources (HR)

items.title: Bounce Back From Failure & Turn Conflict into Collaboration
items.headline: Failure and conflict are often thought of negatively but they can become positive turning points when handled well.
objectives_summary: Set SMART goals to keep you focused during moments of failure.
Examine failures systematically to make changes for the future.
De-activate workplace conflict triggers by aligning your organization with team members’ needs.

items.title: Talent Management basics: learn modern Human Resources (HR)
items.headline: Learn to attract, Recruit and Retain the best talent. learn modern HR by integrating talent management with business
objectives_summary: Learn Best Talent Management practices of modern era.
Crucial steps of hiring the right talent in your company or startup.
Talent Acquisition.

items.title: Certification Course in Human Resource Management

visible_instructors.name: Abhisek
visible_instructors.title: Abhisek Gupta
visible_instructors.job_title: HR Leader, Author, Leadership & Management Coach, PM and OD

items.headline: Curriculum commensurate to Top B School’s Management Program : with downloadable resources, quiz, assessments & exercise
objectives_summary: Complete Certification Course in HRM
You will learn the key factors in the development of HR and People Management
What is Human Resource Management (HRM) and the Scope of Human Resource Management, the Processes in HRM and Role of HRM

items.title: Human Resources (HR) as a Business Partner

visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course provides valuable information on how Human Resource Business Partnering (HRBP) operates in practice.
objectives_summary: Explore the Human Resource Business Partnering (HRBP) Approach and recognize its Key Drivers
Identify the attitudes, knowledge and skills required of a Human Resources (HR) Business Partner
Discover how to operate as a successful HR Business Partner

items.title: [2021] Optimized Interview: For Hiring Managers & Recruiters

visible_instructors.name: Ryan
visible_instructors.title: Ryan Lecour
visible_instructors.job_title: Automation, Lead Generation, Marketing & Sales Expert

items.headline: A practical step-by-step interviewing guide to help you hire the best candidates every time
objectives_summary: Build structured testing into your interviews.
Identify good candidates with objective evaluation & assessment.
Uncover potential 'red flags' and the 'real story' from candidates.

items.title: Human Resource Management - Comprehensive Course on HRM

visible_instructors.name: Data Training
visible_instructors.title: Data Training Campus
visible_instructors.job_title: A School for Data and Design Professionals

items.headline: A guide to HR metrics, Recruitment, Retention, Performance Management, Employee Relations, Satisfaction, Communication
objectives_summary: Learn about HR metrics, Recruitment, Retention, Performance Management, Employee Relations, Satisfaction, Communication
Identify the main responsibilities of Human resource managers
Explain the need to strategic plans and Human resource as the internal and external environments change

items.title: Learning and Development Methods
items.headline: Learn how to develop employees and decipher the practices of Human Resource Development
objectives_summary: Recognise the most popular types of learning and development methods and opportunities available to organizations
Choose the best L&D method through the discussion of their pros and cons
Design, set up, launch and implement a new L&D intervention from scratch in your organisation

items.title: Human Resources 101: Learning HR fundamentals today
items.headline: Learn the basics in Human Resources Management through HR involvement in different stages in the employee lifecycle
objectives_summary: Articulate different HR expertise areas throughout the employee lifecycle
Understand what HR practitioners do on a daily basis, and how HR function can be structured to support the business
Make a better-informed decision on the level of interest you have in different areas of expertise within HR

items.title: Proper Segregation of Duties for Internal Control

visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course examines and discusses key roles and tasks that should be evaluated for proper segregation of duties.
objectives_summary: Explore the definition of segregation of duties (SOD), and recognize how it applies to roles and processes.
Identify risks of inadequate SOD.
Recognize how SOD applies to individual business processes.

items.title: How to Master Hiring: Pick the right candidate every time

visible_instructors.name: PracticalGrowth
visible_instructors.title: PracticalGrowth
visible_instructors.job_title: Practical, applicable courses for career growth

items.headline: Learn how to attract, identify, and select the best candidates for any job you need to fill
objectives_summary: If and when new hires are needed and how to align them with company goals and objectives
The role of a hiring manager and how they can be most effective
Putting together a great job posting to attract the best talent

items.title: Interviewing Skills: How to Recognize & Hire The Best
items.headline: Conduct interviews with confidence using Behavior Based Interviewing - a proven method for selecting top performers.
objectives_summary: Conduct interviews with confidence
Learn interview tips to hire the best
Use science-based interviewing skills

items.title: Hands-On HR Analytics Online Course for Human Resources
items.headline: People Analytics & Analytical Process to Human Capital | XL & Open Source Data Mining & ML Tools | 6 Data Assignments
objectives_summary: Select relevant HR Metrics relevant for your organization and build HR Dashboards
Know what data to look for in various scenarios relating to HR
Select the right analytics methods/tools for a given HR scenario

items.headline: Recruiter Training - Essential IT Knowledge for Successful IT Recruiting
objectives_summary: generate additional business in IT Recruiting, understand the fundamental IT Architecture and Technology which would help them to be efficient in IT Recruitment
